definition: protective umbrella/fig. person affording protection (esp. corrupt)
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
see 和尚打傘，無法無天|和尚打伞，无法无天[he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1]
lit. like a monk holding an umbrella — no hair, no sky (idiom) (punning on 髮|发[fa4] vs 法[fa3])/fig. defying the law and the principles of heaven/lawless
pinyin: he2 shang5 da3 san3 , wu2 fa3 wu2 tian1

sentences.english: One of his hands, as I have said, held the umbrella: in the other arm he carried several brown-paper parcels.
sentences.chinese: 他一隻手撐着傘，另一隻手臂抱着幾個棕色的紙包。

sentences.english: One day I was going to my auntie's home, mom told me to bring an umbrella in case it mined.
sentences.chinese: 一天我去姑姑家，媽媽叮囑我帶把傘以防下雨。

sentences.english: When the first paraglider appeared, People's dream came true.
sentences.chinese: 自從飛行傘出現後，人們的這一願望得以實現。

sentences.english: Now days there are tens of thousands paragliding fans all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 如今，在世界各地，飛行傘愛好者已達數十萬。

sentences.english: Tenderly I put away the umbrella, slowly the rain drenches my heart.
sentences.chinese: 溫和地我收拾傘，慢慢地雨溼透我的心。

sentences.english: The high vault and high aspect ratio for an intermediate is the base of this concept.
sentences.chinese: 高傘拱和高展弦比是本款傘設計理念的基本。

sentences.english: In strong wind, let someone grab your leading edge from the center.
sentences.chinese: 強風時，請人幫忙抓住傘中央前緣風口處。

sentences.english: Question: When speaking of umbrella and fan, which quantifier do we use?
sentences.chinese: 說到傘和扇子的時候，我們會用到哪個量詞呢？

sentences.english: I'm sorry to have taken your umbrella by mistake.
sentences.chinese: 對不起，我誤拿了你的傘。

sentences.english: If l were you , I'd take an umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 如果我是你，我就會帶一把傘。

sentences.english: Death to all who steal other people's umbrellas at convenience stores on rainy days.
sentences.chinese: 所有在雨天偷竊便利商店門口傘的人都去死吧。

sentences.english: Who was I to put up an umbrella, sky.
sentences.chinese: 誰在爲我撐起一把傘，撐起一片天空。

sentences.english: When I took out umbrellas block the sun .
sentences.chinese: 當我撐起一把遮擋太陽的傘。

sentences.english: Granny quietly touched the small umbrella, and then put her back in the cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 老奶奶悄悄摸了摸小花傘，然後把她放回了櫃子。

definition: to go out/to leave home/to go on a journey/away from home/(of a woman) to get married
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise
to support/to prop up/to push or move with a pole/to maintain/to open or unfurl/to fill to bursting point/brace/stay/support
Fenghuang county in Xiangxi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 湘西土家族苗族自治州[Xiang1 xi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1]
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
paper/CL:張|张[zhang1],沓[da2]/classifier for documents, letter etc
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc

to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
